answers.answer: I don't trust the estimate  weight on ultrasound. When I was getting induced with my daughter bc of gd they estimated her weight by ultrasound at 9lbs 11 oz and a few hours later she weighed 7lbs 9oz

question: So im at 33 weeks 2 days today. I had a measurement done at the Perinatal 2 days ago and baby is on point for bones but weighing in at 4 lbs 14 oz (i inquired about the accuracy of estimation foe their instruments and the tech said +-2 oz). I know there is always risk of c section with ANY pregnancy but am curious to any moms with Gestational Diabetes...h9w big was ur baby at 33 weeks+ and delivery?
title: SIZE OF GDM BABIES
